name: roboticmowerforUS
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can use this skill to connect and control your robot mower. When using this skill, you need to bind it with your Robotic-mower Connect account. After successful binding, you can use this skill to control your robot mower. For example, say to your Alexa, "Alexa, set {your robot mower} to start working.", and your robot mower will start working. Similarly, you can also control your robot mower to stop, mow, return to charge, and use the command "Alexa, what is the status of {your robot mower}?" to query the working status of your robot mower. This skill is only available in North America.
